text: Midsommar is a 2019 folk horror movie written and directed by Ari Aster. The movie stars Florence Pugh, Jack Reynor, William Jackson Harper, Vilhelm Blomgren, and Will Poulter. It follows a group of friends who travel to Sweden for a midsummmer festival that occurs once every ninety years and find themselves in the clutches of a dangerous pagan cult. == Cast == *Florence Pugh as Dani Ardor *Jack Reynor as Christian Hughes *William Jackson Harper as Josh *Vilhelm Blomgren as Pelle *Will Poulter as Mark == References == ==Other websites== * Midsommar on IMDb Category:2019 horror movies Category:American horror movies Category:Hungarian movies Category:Swedish horror movies Category:English-language movies Category:Multilingual movies Category:Movies set in Sweden Category:Movies set in the United States Category:Movies about cults Category:Movies about human sacrifice
title: Midsommar
